title: Twitter reacts to Dominick Reyes' quick TKO of Chris Weidman at UFC on ESPN 6
text:
Dominick Reyes spoiled Chris Weidman’s light heavyweight debut on Friday when he emerged victorious from the UFC on ESPN 6 main event.

Reyes (12-0 MMA, 6-0 UFC) remained undefeated in his career with a first-round TKO victory over former UFC champ Weidman (14-5 MMA, 10-5 UFC) in the headlining matchup, which took place at TD Garden in Boston and aired on ESPN2.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Reyes’ win over Weidman at UFC on ESPN 6.

* * * *

We've arrived at the #UFCBoston main event on ESPN2! Undefeated @DomReyes is set to welcome former UFC champ @ChrisWeidman to the light heavyweight division. https://t.co/44OWf0fomk pic.twitter.com/p04leAXikG — MMA Junkie (@MMAjunkie) October 19, 2019

Dominick Reyes smokes Chris Weidman inside of a round. — Luke Thomas (@lthomasnews) October 19, 2019

Wow made it look easy. — Tito Ortiz (@titoortiz) October 19, 2019

That was actually pretty good reffing by Herb Dean. — Dann Stupp (@DannStupp) October 19, 2019

Hey UFC, don't let Weidman retire. Book Weidman vs Anderson 3 please. — Matheus Aquino (@MatheusDCAquino) October 19, 2019

He better have a good mic callout of Jon — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 19, 2019

Chris Weidman has now been dropped in his last 5 fights. — Jed Meshew II (@JedKMeshew) October 19, 2019

chin up champ @chrisweidman you a legend — Dillon Danis (@dillondanis) October 19, 2019

Weidmans the man he needs to rebuild stop fighting the best in the division every fight — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 19, 2019

At 205, Rockhold didn't look like himself. Weidman did, but the damage and miles seemingly can't be erased with a weight class change. — Luke Thomas (@lthomasnews) October 19, 2019

Chris Weidman has been knocked out five times in his last six fights and this is the first time he was finished inside of the first frame. #UFCBoston — Michael Carroll (@MJCflipdascript) October 19, 2019
description: See the top Twitter reactions to Dominick Reyes' quick win over Chris Weidman in the UFC on ESPN 6 main event.
